title: This lifetime learning package featuring Rosetta Stone makes a great stocking stuffer!
content:
Macworld

Got someone on your holiday gift-shopping list who absorbs knowledge like a sponge? Then, get them the gift of unending education with the Unlimited Lifetime Learning Subscription Bundle (featuring the ever-popular Rosetta Stone!). It’s now on sale for only $159.97 with code ROSETTA until October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!

This package is ideal for anyone who likes to learn. As mentioned, it comes with a lifetime subscription to Rosetta Stone and all 24 of its languages. Users will enjoy an immersive language learning experience, gaining necessary conversational skills for shopping, ordering food, and more. Plus, there’s Rosetta Stone’s TruAccent™, the world’s best speech recognition technology that can help speakers sound more fluent!

Then, for those who like to learn new and marketable skills, a lifetime subscription to StackSkills Unlimited (4.5-star rated on Trustpilot!) is also included. It features over 1,000 courses for marketing, finance, IT, graphic design, and much more, and new ones are added every month, so the training will always remain relevant. Some courses even come with certifications, so it’s a particularly good resource for IT professionals.

This holiday season, give the gift of lifetime education with the Unlimited Lifetime Learning Bundle featuring Rosetta Stone and StackSkills, now just $159.97 when you enter code ROSETTA at checkout. Hurry, this deal ends October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!
